name: 魏銪志
objective:
Introduction to Information Security is the basic course of information security. Its main purpose is to enable students who are new to the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a more correct understanding of information security. The course expects to guide students to obtain iPAS Certification.

資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知，課程期望輔導學生取得 iPAS「初級資訊安全工程師」證照。
schedule:
Week  Topic
1. Introduction to Information Security
2. E-commerce security
3. Physical Security
4. Information Security Law and Ethics
5. Introduction to Cryptography
6. Introduction to Network Security
7. Access Control(1)
8. Access Control(2)
9. Mid-term exam
10. Information Security Management
11. System development management
12. Operation Security 
13. Mobile and wireless security
14. Firewall, IDS, VPN (1)
15. Firewall, IDS, VPN (2)
16. Cloud and Big Data Security
17. Internet of Things Security
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
